text: Wadanda suke cin ribã ba su tashi, fãce kamar yadda wanda da Shaiɗan yake ɗimautarwa daga shafa yake tashi. Wancan, dõmin lalle ne sun ce: "Ciniki kamar riba yake."Kuma Allah Ya halatta ciniki kuma Ya haramta riba. To, wanda wa'azi daga Ubangijinsa, ya je masa, sa'an nan ya hanu, to yana da abin da ya shige, kuma al'amarinsa (ana wakkala shi) zuwa ga Allah. Kuma wanda ya kõma, to, waɗannan sũ ne abõkan Wuta, sũ a cikinta madawwama ne
